channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Just Got Some Bad News Before the G7 Conference
Peru, the US's top blueberry supplier, looks to China as tariffs hit
Mitch McConnell Grills Pete Hegseth on Russia in Damning Exchange
Toyota And Subaru Dragged To Court Because A Simple Component Keeps Failing
Jury awards more than $500,000 to Guatemalan men who said they were exploited on Michigan farms
item.description: A jury has awarded more than $500,000 to five men from Guatemala who said they were exploited and underpaid by a labor contractor that brought them to...

item.title: 2 men plead not guilty in New York crypto kidnapping and torture case
item.description: Two crypto investors have pleaded not guilty to charges they kidnapped and tortured an Italian man for his Bitcoin in a Manhattan townhouse

item.title: Oklahoma court clears the way for execution of a man convicted in a Tulsa woman's killing
item.description: An Oklahoma appeals court has ordered a stay of execution for a man on death row to be lifted, clearing the way for him to receive a lethal injection

item.title: Hegseth defends use of troops to protect immigration raids in Los Angeles
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is defending his decision to order National Guard troops to provide security during immigrations raids in Los Angeles

item.title: US prepares to order departure of all nonessential staff from Baghdad embassy, officials say
